Text: Lovely mosque with lots of parking space and inside space for more people,.friendly management staff
Beautiful mosque, great location, super clean and well laid out. May allah bless the committee running this mosque for a great job in maintaining and providing services for the Muslim community

This beautiful mosque is a gift to us from ALLAH.spacious, comfortable, clean, big car park and a large community Hall with kitchen.and of course Madrasah for the religious education for our future generations.
A very clean masjid and follows covid regulations.well done
One of the best Masjid in whole UK , you will feel how much cal and peaceful you will feel once you get inside, May Allah bless the people who manage this place
Great Mosque that welcomes everyone, excellent praying facilities for both men and women, and has a fantastic community ethos.

The only nearby mosque in Stockport town area. Small mosque but cold accommodate good number of attendees. 2 Shifts for Jumaa 12.30 & 1.30 pm during winter; 1.30 & 2.30pm during summer. Parkings are limited -on surrounding areas.
Fantastic mosque, nice wudu section and toilets were clean and well kept. Gets full quickly on Jummah though, so arrive early for the 12:20 Jama'at. If you miss it, there's another Jama'at at 1:20.

Beautiful mosque funded by the community of uk muslims that took decades to build but ran by numpties just like the many other JTI establishments no focus on actual education of the masses or practicality but more so on how to get people to donate. Waste of potential but great to look at if your in the area.
Stunning Masjid, very spacious, clean and peaceful. I wish it was open all the time: have visited sometimes and unfortunately was shut.
Architectural nice mosque and decor is lovely too.imam very knowledgeable and friendly congregation. Very enjoyable and rewarding experience
Lovely Bangladeshi community Masjid with clean facilities. No chatting, calm and quiet atmosphere. Really peaceful
Masha'Allah. Nice and clean Mosque
Good Prayer Services
Mashallah, true commitment shown to provide excellent facilities for local Muslim Community
Good masjid with tidy and great imams in it...I loved it..
Small and a great place for daily prayer.
Great mosque with ample prayer space and ample parking nearby.
Beautiful mosque, good Wudu facilities and toilets, plenty parking in front of masjid, supermarket car park available as well.
A beautiful mosque with clean prayer halls and a great community spirit. Please ignore all hateful comments from those who have never even visited and are just trying to defame the community.
Nice, big, well managed mosque,  Separate section for women to pray.
One of the best few mosque in the uk very clean very organised best management team

Assalamu alaikum,

Dear volunteers and team at EIC. I just wanted to express my written gratitude to each of you including our dear Imam Muhammad, Shaykh Fahim, Shaykh Muhammad Saleh, Ustadh Nouman and every single volunteer who made this Ramadan a tremendously smooth spiritually uplifting month full of khayr.

May Allah swt allow it to weigh heavy on your scale of good deeds and a means by which we all attain maghfirah and jannatul firdaus through His Mercy.

From the beautiful Quran recitation, to the class from Ustadh Nouman at the end, the delicious iftaars, the organised car parking, the well maintained cleanliness of the bathrooms, the openness to families especially younger children, the cr√®che facilities upstairs and everything in between. Firstly, we thank Allah (swt) and secondly each of you including those behind the scenes who many may not see but Allah (swt) knows about.

JazakumAllah khayr
Probably the only diverse masjid that caters for all...plenty activities and awesome community

The prayers area is larage enough
There are many varietes of community activites for men,women and youth
Clean toilets and wadou areas

Peaceful atmosphere for prayers and worship.
Locals are welcoming and warm.

Nicely maintained Masjid being very effectively managed by an efficient and very active Masjid Committee of the worshippers who come, pray and bow before Allah, The Mightiest of all, 5 times a day... May Allah SWT reward all of you for the sacred cause..
Well done all.

Use the back door to enter the masjid in the gated parking.

Very warm and clean mosque.
Very clean and spacious mosque with full facilities and plenty of parking.
Descent and humble place for prayer and I know they have good teaching for holy quran
Beautiful and peaceful place of worship. Congregation from all ethnicities,all praying to the One God. May He accept our sincere worship.Ameen.

Jazakum Allah Khair.

Very clean and spacious prayer space. There is a designated area for sisters too.
lovely mosque... located underground floor
